  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120492</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120492</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uskladi širjenje  z  diagramom TS</string>
            <string language="en">Match the expansion to the TS graph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bringen Sie die Expansion zum TS-Diagramm 
zusammen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appariez l'expansion au graphique de SOLIDES 
TOTAUX</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combine a expansão ao gráfico dos TS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbini l'espansione al grafico degli ST</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάξτε με την επέκταση τη γραφική παράσταση TS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corresponda con la extensión al gráfico de los 
TS</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V posodi segrevamo plin in spremljamo pripadajoči pV diagram in entropijo.</string>
            <string language="en">A gas is heated inside a sealed container. Observe the resulting pV diagram and entropy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pv diagram</string>
            <string language="en">pv diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">entropija</string>
            <string language="en">entropy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Gas ist lebhaftes Innere ein Siegelbehälter. 
Beobachten Sie das resultierende pV Diagramm und Entropie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un gaz est intérieur de chauffage par récipient 
scellé. Observez le diagramme résultant et l'entropie de pV.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um gás é interior aquecido um o recipiente 
selado. Observe o diagrama resultante e a entropia do pV.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gas è parte interna riscaldata un il 
contenitore sigillato. Osservi lo schema risultante e l'entropia
di pV.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το α αέριο θερμαίνεται μέσα σε ένα σφραγισμένο 
εμπορευματοκιβώτιο. Παρατηρήστε το προκύπτουσες pV 
διάγραμμα και την εντροπία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un gas es interior calentado al envase sellado. 
Observe el diagrama y la entropía del pV que resulta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pv Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entropie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diagramme de pv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">entropie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diagrama do pv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">entropia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema di pv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">entropia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάγραμμα PV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εντροπία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diagrama del pv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">entropía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
